title: The Everyday Halogen Family Cookbook - EPUB
description:
Pages: 240 pages
Publisher: Spring Hill (October 28, 2011)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1905862709
ISBN-13: 978-1905862702
Format: EPUB


In Sarah Flower's follow-up to her bestselling The Everyday Halogen Oven Cookbook she brings you another 200 delicious and nutritious recipes to cook in your halogen oven. Ideal for families, halogen ovens are energy efficient, portable, space saving, and can cook up to 40% faster than conventional ovens. They also make the perfect one pot cooker. Sarah uses her own halogen oven every day whether she's cooking for her family of two boys or having friends round. In this book she shows you how to roast, grill, defrost, steam, bake and brown. She shows you, too, how by using the racks to layer your food you can cook complete meals from start to finish in your halogen. Choose from a lovely family roast with seasonal vegetables, right through to your kids' favourite burger and potato wedges for when they invite friends home for tea. Sarah's book contains recipes for: - Complete meals - Soups, casseroles and one pot dishes - Delicious main meals - Tempting cakes and desserts - Entertaining with your halogen - Speedy meals.
